akas: The Mayor of Mars USA (working title)
akas from release info: The Mayor of Mars USA (working title)

1.title: Henry's Birthday
1.plot: While trying to celebrate his birthday, Henry keeps getting interrupted by crimes and has to go out as his alert ego, Kid Danger.

2.title: Whistlin' Susie
2.plot: After accidentally activating an atomic bomb in the Man Cave, Ray and Henry decide to drive it out into the Swellview desert in order to save their city.

3.title: Thumb War
3.plot: Captain Man and Kid Danger are upset when a new crime-fighting team emerges in town. However, they discover that the new-duo are their biggest fans. After an unfortunate incident, the Thumb Buddies seek revenge on our heroes.

4.title: The Great Cactus Con
4.plot: Jasper gets the chance to take his crush to Cactus Con, but when a mysterious villain gets involved in the convention, the entire gang is forced into action.

5.title: Part 1: A New Evil
5.plot: Henry is trapped at home with his family while Captain Man heads out to save the founder of TwitFlash; Charlotte and Schwoz put together a mystery that could change the world forever.

6.title: Part 2: A New Darkness
6.plot: After a criminal steals Kid Danger's superpower and learns his secret identity, goons are sent to Henry's house to attack; while Henry and Ray fight to protect Henry's family, Jasper, Charlotte, and Schwoz work to get his power back.

7.title: Part 3: A New Hero
7.plot: Schwoz works to create an anti-virus to stop an evil plan; Kid Danger and Captain Man battle a villain; Kid Danger's heroism is put to the ultimate test as they fight to save the world.

8.title: Broken Armed and Dangerous
8.plot: When Kid Danger publicly breaks his arm, Henry and the gang have to find a way to keep his secret safe.

9.title: Knight & Danger
9.plot: When the Knight Squad's archenemy, Ryker, is unleashed on Swellview, Kid Danger and Captain Man take him down to Burger Castle only to be tricked into joining forces with the villain.

10.title: Grand Theft Otto
10.plot: When Piper's school parrot, Otto, starts to repeat that Henry is Kid Danger, Henry and Jasper have to stall until Ray, Charlotte and Schwoz can find a way to fix things.

11.title: The Whole Bilsky Family
11.plot: Henry's nerves are tested when Piper invites her new boyfriend and his family over for dinner.

12.title: Secret Room
12.plot: After Schwoz's family reunion causes chaos in the Man Cave, Captain Man reveals a "Superheroes Only" room in the Man Cave for peace and quiet. Jealous, Charlotte, Jasper and Schwoz make a cooler room to show them up. As the gang fights over who gets the better room, things get blown out of proportion.

1.title: The Danger Begins
1.plot: 13-year-old Henry Hart lands a part time job as Kid Danger, the sidekick-in-training to superhero Captain Man. After promising to keep his new identity a secret, Henry must navigate a double life.

2.title: Mo' Danger, Mo' Problems
2.plot: As Henry tries to adjust to his new role as Kid Danger, he struggles to balance his schedule between crime fighting, school, family and friends.

3.title: The Secret Gets Out
3.plot: Henry's life as Kid Danger is threatened when Charlotte gets increasingly suspicious about the secrets he's been hiding.

4.title: Tears of the Jolly Beetle
4.plot: When Captain Man loses his powers of invulnerability, he becomes too afraid to fight crime. It is up to Kid Danger to keep Swellview safe and figure out how to restore Captain Man's powers.

5.title: Substitute Teacher
5.plot: When a suspicious new student shows up at school, Charlotte and Henry think he may be up to something. Captain Man goes undercover as a substitute teacher to learn more.

6.title: Jasper Danger
6.plot: When Jasper is Kid Danger for Halloween, Captain Man mistakes him being Kid Danger instead of Henry. So it is now up to Jasper to save Halloween.

7.title: The Space Rock
7.plot: When a piece of rock from outer space is more than it seems, trouble follows Henry to his home.

8.title: Birthday Girl Down
8.plot: An accusation prevents Henry from being invited to a girl's birthday party.

9.title: Too Much Game
9.plot: Henry believes that he was replaced on the basketball team by an older boy.

10.title: Henry the Man-Beast
10.plot: Henry is exposed to a strange device in the Man Cave which causes problems on a date.

11.title: Invisible Brad
11.plot: Ray's friend, who was accidentally turned invisible, shows up for a visit, but he quickly overstays his welcome. Meanwhile, Jasper fixes up Piper's old doll-house in the backyard.

12.title: Spoiler Alert
12.plot: Henry and Ray must deal with an annoying new villain called the Spoiler; Piper tries to join a popular Captain Man fan club.

13.title: Let's Make a Steal
13.plot: In an attempt to investigate a string of robberies, Captain Man gets Henry a spot on his favorite game show.

14.title: Super Volcano
14.plot: Henry and Ray think the world is ending when a dormant super volcano under Swellview becomes active; Piper is convinced that she has gluten intolerance.

15.title: My Phony Valentine
15.plot: When Henry's crush goes on a Valentine's date with someone else, Schwoz provides an android to make her jealous. Ray has an unpleasant date with one of Henry's teachers.

16.title: Caved In
16.plot: Henry, Charlotte and Ray's plans for a day of fun are derailed when Jasper accidentally triggers the emergency lock down mode for Junk-N-Stuff and the Man Cave, trapping everyone inside.

17.title: Elevator Kiss
17.plot: After Kid Danger saves Bianca, they both share a kiss. But later Henry gets upset about it.

18.title: Man of the House
18.plot: After Henry's mother's purse is stolen, Captain Man decides he has to move into his house to protect his family from criminals.

19.title: Dream Busters
19.plot: A villain's dream beam traps Henry in a dream state from which only Charlotte can rescue him.

20.title: Kid Grounded
20.plot: Henry is grounded after he is caught sneaking out at night; while Piper drives Henry crazy at home, Charlotte steps into the sidekick role.

21.title: Captain Jerk
21.plot: Captain Man attempts to boost his image by holding a contest where three winners gets a tour of his secret lair. When Henry's friends are among the winners, Henry becomes concerned for his secret identity.

22.title: The Bucket Trap
22.plot: Henry and Charlotte want to tell Jasper that Henry is really Kid Danger. They decide to give Jasper a test secret to prove he's ready.

23.title: Henry & the Bad Girl: Part 1
23.plot: A graffiti gang is spray-painting all over Swellview; while trying to track down a gang leader, Kid Danger is tempted by a cute girl in the gang.

24.title: Henry & the Bad Girl: Part 2
24.plot: A graffiti gang is spray-painting all over Swellview; while trying to track down a gang leader, Kid Danger is tempted by a cute girl in the gang.

25.title: Jasper's Real Girlfriend
25.plot: When Jasper's summer camp girlfriend comes to town, she quickly grows jealous thinking that Charlotte is in love with Jasper.

1.title: The Beat Goes On
1.plot: Henry finds himself in danger when he realizes Dr. Minyak has transformed Charlotte into a super strong being set to capture Kid Danger and Captain Man. Or be captured by Dr. Minyak

2.title: One Henry, Three Girls: Part 1
2.plot: Henry must juggle his work life and his romantic life while trying to capture a grandmother who is terrorizing Captain Man at public appearances.

3.title: One Henry, Three Girls: Part 2
3.plot: Henry's plans for the school dance become complicated when he must also appear as Kid Danger; Kid Danger is forced to make a dramatic decision.

4.title: Henry and the Woodpeckers
4.plot: When Piper's basketball coach quits, Henry becomes the coach of Piper's team; Henry is challenged by the League Board and its unorthodox rules.

5.title: Captain Man: On Vacation
5.plot: Henry and Charlotte are in charge of protecting Swellview while Ray is out of town at his cousin's wedding.

6.title: The Time Jerker
6.plot: When Kid Danger and Captain Man battle the Time Bandit, Kid Danger accidentally falls into the Time Bandit's time machine and relives the same day over again.

7.title: Secret Beef
7.plot: Henry decides to bring his boss to Swellview's most exclusive restaurant.

8.title: Henry's Jelly
8.plot: After Jasper is lauded for being a local hero, Henry becomes jealous that Kid Danger is the one getting all the thanks.

9.title: Christmas Danger
9.plot: When Captain Man gets arrested for committing a petty crime, he is forced to spend Christmas in jail.

10.title: Indestructible Henry: Part 1
10.plot: Henry goes through the Densitizer after Kid Danger is nearly injured so that he can be indestructible.

11.title: Indestructible Henry: Part 2
11.plot: Henry goes through the Densitizer after Kid Danger is nearly injured so that he can be indestructible.

12.title: Text, Lies, & Video
12.plot: When a video of Henry and Ray transforming into Kid Danger and Captain Man gets out, Henry must go to great lengths to retrieve it and protect his secret identity.

13.title: Opposite Universe
13.plot: Henry and Charlotte travel to an opposite universe where evil counterparts of Ray and Schwoz want to destroy Piper.

14.title: Grave Danger
14.plot: When Ray starts behaving strangely, Henry and Charlotte investigate and are surprised to discover the cause of his behavior.

15.title: Ox Pox
15.plot: When Piper gets a mysterious illness, Captain Man must travel back in time to the 1700s to find the only cure.

16.title: Twin Henrys
16.plot: Henry has a shape-shifting android fill in at a family dinner so that he can watch an MMA fight with Charlotte and Ray.

17.title: Danger & Thunder
17.plot: In a special crossover with "The Thundermans", Phoebe Thunderman comes over to Swellview to help Kid Danger and Captain Man stop a villain meeting in town. But when they finally get there, Phoebe realizes her brother Max Thunderman is one of the "villains" attending.

18.title: I Know Your Secret
18.plot: When Henry receives a series of mysterious notes from someone, he begins to worry that the sender may know his secret identity.

1.title: A Fiñata Full Of Death Bugs
1.plot: When Jasper accidentally gives away a piñata full of killer bees to Piper for her friend's birthday party, Henry and Ray must find a way to sneak in and remove it before harm can be done. They eventually dress up as clowns to infiltrate the house, but things don't exactly go as planned, and the fiñata eventually breaks when Henry finally manages to get it down from the tree.

2.title: Love Muffin
2.plot: A female criminal named Gwen uses special muffins to make Captain Man fall in love with her so that she can access the Man Cave. When Henry, Charlotte, and Schowz catch onto the plan, they must work to keep Captain Man from marrying her.

3.title: Scream Machine
3.plot: When Charlotte's invention for the Gizmo Show gets destroyed and then rebuilt, she worries all the attention she gets will expose Henry and Ray's identity.

4.title: Mouth Candy
4.plot: When Jasper is falsely accused of a burglary and sent to jail, Henry and Ray must find a way to set him free.

5.title: The Trouble with Frittles
5.plot: Captain Man and Kid Danger find themselves in the middle of a debate about Swellview's favorite snack.

6.title: Hour of Power
6.plot: When Drex, a dangerous criminal who just escaped from Swellview prison, embarrasses Kid Danger and traps Captain Man in a helmet, Kid Danger must use the help of Schwoz to gain a super power and defeat Drex.

7.title: Dodging Danger
7.plot: When Henry teams up with Jasper and Piper for a dodgeball tournament and wins by using his powers, Ray decides to go undercover along with Schwoz and Charlotte at the tournament and beat him to teach him a lesson.

8.title: Double Date Danger
8.plot: When Miss Shapen's niece comes into town and chooses Jasper over Henry, he discovers that she has much bigger plans in the works.

9.title: Space Invaders: Part 1
9.plot: Captain man and kid danger set out on a quest to save two astronauts from being held hostage, meanwhile Piper forces everyone in her house to wait for her fred Lobster commercial.

10.title: Space Invaders: Part 2
10.plot: On the space station, Captain Man and Kid Danger discover a little girl took the astronauts hostage; after realizing the astronauts perform experiments on bunnies, Captain Man and Kid Danger decide to help her.

11.title: Gas or Fail
11.plot: When Captain Man finds himself trapped underground, Henry must devise a way to sneak out of his school's standardized testing to save Ray.

12.title: JAM Session
12.plot: When Ray hears that Piper is going to Junior Anger Management to work on her anger issues, he makes a wager with Henry that he can make her lose her temper before the night ends.

13.title: License to Fly
13.plot: Ray agrees to let Henry fly his helicopter, but Ray starts to act like a nervous parent; Charlotte, Jasper and Piper find a cotton candy machine.

14.title: Green Fingers
14.plot: After Schwoz creates a disease that accidentally effects Charlotte, Henry, his family, and even Ray, he quarantines them in Henry's house in order to find a cure.

15.title: Stuck in Two Holes
15.plot: Charlotte and Jasper must come to the rescue when Captain Man and Kid Danger are each Stuck in a Hole.

16.title: Live & Dangerous: Part 1
16.plot: A famous Internet celebrity invites Captain Man and Kid Danger to his party, but the party does not turn out the way they expected; Charlotte baby-sits Piper.

17.title: Live & Dangerous: Part 2
17.plot: When Frankini announces his plan to unmask Kid Danger and Captain Man, Charlotte, Schwoz, Jasper and Piper must snap into action to stop him.

18.title: Balloons of Doom
18.plot: When Dr. Minyak takes the Man Fans hostage, Captain Man and Kid Danger have to find a way to rescue them without Dr. Minyak seeing them move.

19.title: Swellview's Got Talent
19.plot: After discovering contestants on Swellview's Got Talent are losing consciousness, Captain Man and Kid Danger enlist the help of Charlotte and Schwoz in order to find out what is causing the mischief.

1.title: Sick & Wired
1.plot: Thinking that Henry is not telling the truth about being sick, Ray plants cameras and microphones in Henry's house to catch him in a lie.

2.title: Brawl in the Hall
2.plot: When Charlotte is challenged to a fight at school, Captain Man and Kid Danger step in to try and help Charlotte defend herself.

3.title: The Rock Box Dump
3.plot: When a report comes out that Kid Danger's super power is actually an illness, Kid Danger has to convince Swellview that it is a huge misunderstanding.

4.title: Danger Games
4.plot: When Dr. Minyak plans to ruin Double G's worldwide charity concert, Captain Man and Kid Danger join forces with the Game Shakers to defeat Dr. Minyak and keep Double G safe.

5.title: Toon in for Danger
5.plot: When Henry and Ray get a copy of the new Kid Danger and Captain Man cartoon and see that there's trouble, they must hurry to fix the cartoon before the big premiere party.

6.title: Meet Cute Crush
6.plot: Captain Man and Henry try to help Henry's sister, Piper, organize a sudden romantic introduction with a new boy at school that she likes.

7.title: Back to the Danger: Part 1
7.plot: When Drex escapes into the Time Jerker's time portal, Henry and Ray must go back into the past and stop him before he permanently alters Ray's past.

8.title: Back to the Danger: Part 2
8.plot: When Drex prevents Young Ray from ever being densitized in the past, Henry and a now-destructible Ray must take on Drex and help Ray get back his indestructibility.

9.title: Budget Cuts
9.plot: When the Vice Mayor cuts Captain Man and Kid Danger's budget to build a high-speed railway in Swellview, the duo must figure out creative ways to save money.

10.title: Diamonds Are For Heather
10.plot: Kid Danger and Captain Man are called to the Swellview Museum of Stools and Jewels to prevent the rare Neal Diamond from being stolen.

11.title: Car Trek
11.plot: Charlotte's birthday road trip to see the Boo Man Group perform gets sidetracked by a Captain Man and Kid Danger emergency.

12.title: Toddler Invasion
12.plot: When The Toddler takes control of the Man Cave, Charlotte and Jasper have to find a way to sneak in and save Kid Danger and Captain Man.

13.title: Captain Man-kini
13.plot: When a new internet celebrity causes havoc in Swellview, Captain Man has to swap bodies with Frankini to infiltrate his secret lair.

14.title: Saturday Night Lies
14.plot: When Ray runs into an ex-girlfriend, he tries to impress her by pretending that Henry, Charlotte and Jasper are his children.

15.title: Henry's Frittle Problem
15.plot: When Henry's dad gets an offer for a new job in Bordertown, Henry and Ray go undercover to try and stop him from getting the job and prevent Henry from having to move.

16.title: Spelling Bee Hard
16.plot: Dr. Minyak challenges Captain Man to a spelling bee.

17.title: Up the Stairs!
17.plot: Henry and Ray's friendship is put to the ultimate test when they have to make the half mile trek up the Man Cave stairs in order to make a surprise meal by a celebrity chef in Junk-N-Stuff.

18.title: Danger Things
18.plot: When Piper is taken by a creature from another dimension, Captain Man and Kid Danger must rescue her from the evil science corporation that opened the portal.

19.title: Rubber Duck
19.plot: When Ray accidentally destroys Henry's dad's prized remote control car, they throw a manicure/pedicure party to raise money to fix it.

20.title: Flabber Gassed
20.plot: After acting too confident before a fight, Kid Danger and Captain Man are sprayed with Flabber Gas making them powerless to defeat a new villain in Swellview. Schwoz puts our heroes in Exo-Suits which Charlotte and Jasper control.

imdb.plot outline: Henry Danger follows the adventures of 13-year old Henry Hart whose life takes a wild turn when he gets selected by superhero Captain Man to be his apprentice. After promising to keep his new identity a secret, Henry must navigate a double life balancing the challenges of eighth grade with the crazy adventures of a crime fighter.
imdb.title: Henry Danger
plot: Looking for a part-time job, 13-year-old Henry Hart finds himself helping super hero Captain Man as his sidekick, keeping the secret from his family and friends.

_Henry Danger_ (qv) follows the adventures of 13-year old Henry Hart whose life takes a wild turn when he gets selected by superhero Captain Man to be his apprentice. After promising to keep his new identity a secret, Henry must navigate a double life balancing the challenges of eighth grade with the crazy adventures of a crime fighter.::ahmetkozan
synopsis: Brandon hero coming on Henry danger
